summary: This is an email from an Associate Warden at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 10, 2019, providing attached rosters for Thursday, Friday, and Saturday. It lists the Morning Watch Officers and Lieutenants, but the names are redacted. The email was sent the day before Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody.

persons.name: Associate Warden
persons.role: Associate Warden at MCC New York
persons.context: The sender of the email providing rosters for the correctional facility.

events.title: Email with Rosters Sent
events.description: An Associate Warden at MCC New York sends an email with attached rosters for Thursday, Friday, and Saturday, listing the Morning Watch Officers and Lieutenants.

locations.name: MCC New York
locations.context: Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

locations.name: New York, New York 10007
locations.context: Address for the MCC New York facility.

keyFacts: This document is an email dated August 10, 2019, sent by an Associate Warden at MCC New York.
It provides rosters for Thursday, Friday, and Saturday, which would include August 8-10, 2019.
The names of the Morning Watch Officers and Lieutenants are redacted in the provided text.
The email was sent the day before Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell on August 11, 2019.
It is official correspondence regarding staff scheduling at the facility where Epstein was incarcerated.
